render_values4nmdat <- function(ALL, values4nmdat, category="")  { 
  
status <- renderUI({
  validate(need(ALL$DATA[["check_nmdat"]], message=FALSE))

  #category = "colnames.in.stdlist"
  callModule(module_check_nmdat_status,paste0(category,"_status"), 
             values4nmdat, category )
  div(
    module_check_nmdat_status_UI(id=paste0(category,"_status"),label=NULL ), 
    style="display: inline-block"
  )
  
})

info <- renderUI({
  #category = "colnames.in.stdlist"
  validate(need(ALL$DATA[["check_nmdat"]], message=FALSE), 
           need(values4nmdat[[category]]$status %in% c("yellow", "red"), message=FALSE)
  )
 
  callModule(module_check_nmdat_info, paste0(category,"_info"), values4nmdat, category)
  module_check_nmdat_info_UI(id=paste0(category,"_info"),label=NULL ) 
})

values4nmdat[[category]]$rendered_status = status
values4nmdat[[category]]$rendered_info = info

return(values4nmdat)
}
